about.ourBeliefText: At we believe that every person's life is influenced by planets, stars, and cosmic energies. That's why we provide deep and multi-dimensional analysis of your Kundli.
about.ourExpertTeamText: Our team consists of 10 experienced astrologers, each specializing in different disciplines:

about.samanyaKundliText: Complete birth chart analysis including planetary positions, dasha periods, and basic life predictions. Perfect for understanding your core personality and life path.
about.vipKundliText: Premium personalized consultation with detailed analysis, specific remedies, and ongoing guidance. Includes priority support and follow-up sessions.
about.ourExpertPanelText: At Jyotish Lok, we believe that every life is deeply influenced by cosmic energies, planets, and stars. That's why we provide a comprehensive and multi-dimensional analysis of your Kundli.
about.expertPanelText: Our expert panel consists of 10 experienced astrologers, each specializing in different branches:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Jyotish Lok ("we," "our," or "us"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

servicesDescription.title: 2. Services Description
servicesDescription.content: Jyotish Lok provides astrological services including but not limited to:

userResponsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: As a user of our services, you agree to:
responsibilities: Use our services for personal and spiritual growth only
Respect the spiritual and cultural nature of our services
Not misuse or misrepresent our services

disclaimer.title: 4. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Our astrological services are provided for spiritual guidance and entertainment purposes only. We do not guarantee specific outcomes or results. Astrological predictions and recommendations should not replace professional medical, legal, or financial advice. Users should exercise their own judgment and discretion in all matters.

paymentRefunds.title: 5. Payment and Refunds
paymentRefunds.content: All services must be paid for in advance. We offer the following refund policy:
refundPolicy: Full refund within 24 hours of booking if service hasn't commenced
Partial refund for cancelled services with 48 hours notice
No refunds for completed consultations or services

privacyConfidentiality.title: 6. Privacy and Confidentiality
privacyConfidentiality.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy and maintaining the confidentiality of all personal information shared during consultations. Your birth details, personal concerns, and consultation records are kept strictly confidential and are never shared with third parties without your explicit consent.

intellectualProperty.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Jyotish Lok and is protected by copyright laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our written permission.

limitationLiability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
limitationLiability.content: Jyotish Lok shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of our services. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount paid for the specific service in question.

modifications.title: 9. Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Your continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

contactInformation.title: 10. Contact Information
contactInformation.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us at:

governingLaw.title: 11. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in India.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Jyotish Lok, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our astrological services, website, and related services.

items.name: Name, email address, and phone number
items.birthDetails: Date, time, and place of birth (for astrological services)

items.pagesVisited: Pages visited and time spent on our website

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: We use the collected information for the following purposes:

purposes.payments: Processing payments and managing your account
purposes.communication: Communicating with you about services and updates
purposes.improvement: Improving our website and service quality
purposes.protection: Protecting against fraud and unauthorized access

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.description: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:

consent.title: With Your Consent
consent.description: When you explicitly authorize us to share your information

serviceProviders.title: Service Providers
serviceProviders.description: With trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and providing services

legalRequirements.title: Legal Requirements
legalRequirements.description: When required by law or to protect our rights and safety

businessTransfers.title: Business Transfers
businessTransfers.description: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information:

measures.encryption: Encryption of sensitive data during transmission
measures.limitedAccess: Limited access to personal information by authorized personnel only

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. Astrological consultation records are typically retained for 7 years to provide continuity of service.

yourRights.title: Your Rights and Choices
yourRights.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

access.title: Access
access.description: Request access to your personal information

deletion.title: Deletion
deletion.description: Request deletion of your personal information

portability.title: Portability
portability.description: Request transfer of your data to another service

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience:

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors use our website

cookies.control: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences. However, disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external sites. We encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any personal information.

childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your personal information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure that such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and implement appropriate safeguards to protect your information.

changesToPolicy.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changesToPolicy.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our website and updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

dataProtectionOfficer.title: Data Protection Officer
dataProtectionOfficer.content: For any privacy-related concerns or to exercise your data rights, you may also contact our Data Protection Officer at the same contact information provided above.

rules.gotra: Gotra is mandatory for all pujas. If gotra is unknown, "Kashyap Gotra" will be considered valid.
rules.family: All participants must be from the same family and same gotra.
rules.sankalp: Brahmin will chant the names and gotra of all participants during the sankalp.
rules.video: Puja video will be sent on WhatsApp within 72 hours after completion.
rules.prasad: "Prabhu Prasad Ashirwad Box" will be delivered by courier within 10 days. No additional charges.

about.title: About Us
about.sanskritPhrase: May all beings be happy and peaceful
about.description1: At Jyotish Lok, we believe that every life is guided by the stars, planets, and cosmic energies. Our mission is to help you understand these celestial influences through accurate Kundli analysis and guide you with effective remedies for harmony, prosperity, and peace.
about.description2: Our expert astrologers provide deep insights into your career, relationships, health, and finances. We offer personalized solutions including mantra chanting, gemstone recommendations, Vastu guidance, and spiritual rituals to overcome challenges and attract positive energy.

greatExperience.title: Great Experience
greatExperience.description: 25+ years of experience with thousands of satisfied clients providing reliable astrological services.

dataPrivacy.title: Data Privacy
dataPrivacy.description: Complete security and confidentiality of your personal information is our top priority.
